Articles.Content:
I've noticed that many distinct areas of planets have a lack of distinct biomes. It would add a lot more immersion and fun. Here's a few missing:

Minmus

-Frozen Lakes

-Hills

-Shores

Eve

-Shores

-Highlands

-Lowlands

-Polar Lowlands

-Polar Highlands

-Crater Sea

-Crater Land

-Weird Brown Area (go to Kerbalmaps.com and you'll see a brown area on the Eve map.)

North Polar lowlands

There are no biomes on planets except Mun and Kerbin.

I believe that's on purpose, though we may get them eventually

There are no biomes on planets except Mun and Kerbin.

I believe that's on purpose, though we may get them eventually

I think they just didn't have enough time.
I've already made a thread about this.
Isn't that what we're getting eventually? I think I read somewhere that all planets and moons will have multiple biomes.

I've already made a thread about this.

This makes me quite sad indeed. In fact, it seems almost everything I put here is identical, except yours has more information
I could always merge the threads, if you folks want, them being basically the same and all.

I would absolutely love for someone to add these biomes in game, along with Krag's planet factory. They don't even have to have messages like Kerbin and the Mun do. I would be content with the biomes!

Speaking of which, would it be possible to add biomes with mods, or would it require breaking into the game?

I believe there is a "canyon" biome on the Mun, at least according to the colored biome map here: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/File:MunBiomeMap.png

Also, using the source for Krag's Planet Factory mod I was able to add new planets that, through the mod's use of vanilla planets as templates, have the same biomes as the template planet. What's even better is that they don't overwrite each other ( the "Shores" biome on my planet "Mirror," a copy of Kerbin, have a separate science from the Shores of Kerbin itself). The only drawback is that they still have the same science value as the template planet - even though I had Mirror orbit the extra sun, Serious, it still had the same science point values as those of Kerbin, which are nearly worthless at that point.

As such, the planets from Krag's Planet Factory that are based off of Minmus ( i.e. Ablate, Ascension, Inaccessable, Pock, and Joker), probably have the same biomes as Minmus proper though the heightmaps and textures won't match.

P.S. The mod I made is only used by me and is never going to be distributed, so it never existed. o.O

(Special thanks to Kragrathea for his amazing mod!)
